entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text: Of 120 people arrested in New York for social distancing violations, 92% of them are black or Hispanic. If you walk through our parks and streets and see the people who are treating quarantine like a vacation, you’ll realize how racist this policing is. https://t.co/tDzooHb9Sl
